title: The Crypto Bear Market Is EVEN WORSE Than You Think…

when the crypto markets are
running everybody wants to be and
everybody wants to work in crypto and
nobody cares about how much they're
getting paid
because it's just cool to be in
crypto but now in crypto I would say
it's the exact opposite of that and so
what you realize is that most the people

didn't see the big vision those people

have they lost motivation but they've

were here and we were trading when the

trading meme
coins and I'm sure that everyone here
got overextended into memecoins and I'm
sure that a lot of people here got wiped
now imagine having to go to work every
single day when you your portfolio has
been wiped you hate
crypto the one thing that keeps me going
is that I know that this is temporary
and I know that everybody here who's
been here for long enough knows that
this is temporary and that when the

three green candles and the whole
motivation the whole the whole demeanor
the whole energy the whole mood in the
market in the office completely changes
and also remind myself that and remind
the people that work here that 90 days
ago 90 days
ago our portfolios were at all time
highs like 90 days
ago it's like 90 days everything can
change in 1 month 2 months 3 months and
so you've just got to be around when it
changes bante is more than just
a alpha channel that's going to give you
information on the markets when I'm
telling you you have a family that have
been through war that have all have
incredible personal stories that are
here to fight for something bigger and
they can get through anything together
you can make me bankrupt tomorrow and
I'll do it again you can take away
important things in my life and I'll do
it again and when you have that in your
corner that's what I realized on the
journey with banter this is a global
market meltdown this is not about crypto
and when the markets recover and they
will because markets always recover
sometimes it takes 6 months sometimes it

because it's the first time in crypto's
